data.title: MotorStorm Similar Games
data.meta_description: MotorStorm is a high-octane arcade racer that pits multiple vehicle classes against each other on treacherous off-road tracks. Different pathways cater to each vehicle's strengths and weaknesses.
data.text:
Onrush

June 5, 2018

PC

XONE

PS4

Onrush is a stylish driving game from Codemasters' team of former Motorstorm developers.

MotorStorm RC

February 22, 2012

PS3N

PSNV

The fifth game in the MotorStorm series features RC cars and is a PSN title for both the Vita and the PS3.

MotorStorm: Apocalypse

March 17, 2011

PS3

PS3N

Cars, motorcycles, monster trucks and more all race together through improvised tracks in an abandoned city destroyed by an earthquake, in the fourth instalment in the MotorStorm series.

Harms Way

December 8, 2010

XBGS

Team up as racer or turret gunner in this free team-based hybrid racing/shooter (and coincidentally, enjoy some Doritos brand seasoned tortilla chips)

Nail'd

November 30, 2010

X360

PS3

PC

ATVs and MX Bikes engage top speeds through branching off-road tracks in this outlandish arcade racer.

MX vs. ATV: Reflex

December 1, 2009

PSP

X360

+ 5 more

PS3

DS

XBGS

PC

PSPN

The MX vs. ATV series returns with new gameplay additions such as terrain deformation, dual stick control, a revamped trick system, and a wreck avoidance system.

MotorStorm: Arctic Edge

September 10, 2009

PSP

PS2

+ 2 more

PSPN

PSNV

Take trucks to the tundra as MotorStorm debuts on the PSP and PS2.

DiRT 2

September 8, 2009

MAC

PSP

+ 7 more

X360

PS3

Wii

DS

XBGS

PC

PSPN

DIRT 2 is part of the long-running rally-racing-series from Codemasters.

FUEL

June 2, 2009

X360

PS3

PC

Fuel is an open-world racing game featuring 5,000-plus miles of open road and drastic weather like tornados and blizzards.

MotorStorm: Pacific Rift

October 28, 2008

PS3

MotorStorm: Pacific Rift lets players race in vehicles of all shapes and sizes across the harsh, untamed terrain of a tropical island in the Pacific Ocean.

Baja: Edge of Control

September 22, 2008

X360

PS3

+ 3 more

XBGS

PC

PS4

For the first time, THQ and 2XL Games bring you the agressive, down and dirty racing in Baja: Edge of Control to your living room.

Pure

September 16, 2008

X360

PS3

PC

Pure is an offroad racing game from the creators of the ATV Offroad Fury and MotoGP series. The game puts an emphasis on performing tricks and customizing ATVs with special parts.

Burnout Paradise

January 22, 2008

X360

PS3

+ 6 more

XBGS

PS3N

PC

XONE

PS4

NSW

Burnout Paradise turns the Burnout series on its head by moving from closed set tracks to an open world full of events to experience both alone and in a group online.

DiRT

June 15, 2007

X360

PS3

PC

DiRT is an off-road rally racing game and is the sixth game in the Colin McRae series of games.

Burnout Revenge

September 13, 2005

PS2

X360

+ 2 more

XBOX

XBGS

The fourth installment of the Burnout series of high-octane street racing games, focusing more on aggressive racing with new forms of car combat, including the ability to ram same-way traffic into other racers.

4 Wheel Thunder

April 30, 2000

DC

The off-road cousin to Midway's Hydro Thunder, 4 Wheel Thunder includes everything from buggies to monster trucks as well as massive landscapes with numerous shortcuts and winding paths.

Monster Truck Madness 64

June 30, 1999

N64

Monster Truck Madness 64 is the port of MTM to the Nintendo 64. It tries to mimic all of the gameplay of the PC version as closely as possible.
